name: Memento: Aurora Chronicles
blurb: The cute girl next door meets the playful trouble maker in a crazy anime fantasy-steampunk story RPG.

rewards.reward: No Reward
Thank you very, very much! Every amount counts. You are now officially part of the most bestest pledge drive on Kickstarter.

You receive a DRM-Free digital copy of the game, plus a free Kickstarter exclusive illustrated postcard shipped straight to your door, written personally by Lily and featuring a snapshot picture of both her and Eleta at the beach. Free shipping anywhere in the world.

All the artwork. All the music. You receive both the Original Soundtrack and all the artwork in high resolution! Includes a DRM-Free digital copy of the game and the Cute Illustrated Postcard. Free shipping anywhere in the world.

ELETA FOXTON Fridge Magnet! A Kickstarter exclusive large 9x12 cm Eleta Foxton Fridge Magnet featuring our lovable rogue holding up a pot of coffee and happily asking if you like it black, dark, noir, or if you'd simply prefer a glass of orange juice. All she wants is to be there for you. Includes a DRM-Free digital copy of the game, the Cute Illustrated Postcard, the Original Soundtrack and the High Resolution Artwork. Free shipping anywhere in the world.

LILY CLAIRET Fridge Magnet! A Kickstarter exclusive large 9x12 cm Lily Clairet Fridge Magnet featuring our bright heroine holding up a pot of tea and happily asking if you take milk and sugar, just milk, just sugar, or no milk and sugar. All she wants is to be there for you. Includes a DRM-Free digital copy of the game, the Cute Illustrated Postcard, the Original Soundtrack and the High Resolution Artwork. Free shipping anywhere in the world.

Digital Bundle + Manga/Novella (PDF). Receive a very rare and special Kickstarter exclusive writer and artist collaboration. Entitled 'Eleta Foxton and the Rochester Diamond' (PDF) - this once-in-a-lifetime offer will allow you to have your very own special memento celebrating your contribution during the start of this new series. Includes a DRM-Free digital copy of the game, the Original Soundtrack, the High Resolution Artwork and the Cute Illustrated Postcard. Free shipping anywhere in the world.

PHYSICAL PAPERBACK MANGA/NOVELLA! A very rare and special Kickstarter exclusive writer and artist collaboration. Entitled 'Eleta Foxton and the Rochester Diamond' - this once-in-a-lifetime offer will allow you to have your very own special memento celebrating your contribution during the start of this new series. Includes a DRM-Free digital copy of the game. This option is for those who only want the Game and the Manga/Novella. Includes the Cute Illustrated Postcard.

Receive BOTH the Lily Clairet Fridge Magnet featuring our bright heroine holding up a pot of tea, as well as the Eleta Foxton Fridge Magnet featuring our lovable rogue holding up a pot of coffee! You will be spoilt for choice every hour of the day as you decide which beverage you'd prefer. Includes a DRM-Free digital copy of the game, the Cute Illustrated Postcard, the Original Soundtrack and the High Resolution Artwork. Free shipping anywhere in the world.

Physical Manga/Novella AND Digital Rewards! Receive the Printed Paperback Manga/Novella 'Eleta Foxton and the Rochester Diamond', a DRM-Free digital copy of the game, the Original Soundtrack, the High resolution Artwork and the Cute Illustrated Postcard.

Receive the Kickstarter Exclusive Printed Paperback Manga/Novella 'Eleta Foxton and the Rochester Diamond'. Includes a DRM-Free digital copy of the game, the Cute Illustrated Postcard, the Original Soundtrack, the High Resolution Artwork and can CHOOSE between the Lily Clairet and Eleta Foxton Fridge Magnets.

Receive the Kickstarter Exclusive Printed Paperback Manga/Novella 'Eleta Foxton and the Rochester Diamond'. Includes a DRM-Free digital copy of the game, the Cute Illustrated Postcard, the Original Soundtrack, the High Resolution Artwork and BOTH the Lily Clairet and Eleta Foxton Fridge Magnets.

Girly Book Bundle. Receive a Kickstarter exclusive, absolutely cute eco-friendly double stitched heavy cover A5 40-page notebook perfect to serve as your diary, study helper, art book and more! The cover will feature Eleta happily splashing paint all over a frustrated Lily. You will also receive a DRM-Free digital copy of the Game, the Printed Paperback Manga/Novella 'Eleta Foxton and the Rochester Diamond' and the Cute Illustrated Postcard.

Notebook AND Digital Rewards! Receive a Kickstarter exclusive, absolutely cute eco-friendly double stitched heavy cover A5 40-page notebook perfect to serve as your diary, study helper, art book and more! The cover will feature Eleta happily splashing paint all over a frustrated Lily. You will also receive a DRM-Free digital copy of the Game, the Printed Paperback Manga/Novella 'Eleta Foxton and the Rochester Diamond', the Original Soundtrack, the High Resolution Artwork and the Cute Illustrated Postcard.

Receive the cute notebook, a DRM-Free digital copy of the Game,  the Printed Paperback Manga/Novella 'Eleta Foxton and the Rochester Diamond', the Cute Illustrated Postcard, the Original Soundtrack, the High Resolution Artwork and can CHOOSE between the Lily Clairet and Eleta Foxton Fridge Magnets.

Receive the cute notebook, a DRM-Free digital copy of the Game,  the Printed Paperback Manga/Novella 'Eleta Foxton and the Rochester Diamond', the Cute Illustrated Postcard, the Original Soundtrack, the High Resolution Artwork and BOTH the Lily Clairet and Eleta Foxton Fridge Magnets.

Receive a stylish, physical copy of the game in addition to a digital copy, as well as the option of having your name being thanked in the rolling credits! You will also receive a copy of the Printed Paperback Manga/Novella 'Eleta Foxton and the Rochester Diamond', the Cute Illustrated Postcard, the Original Soundtrack, the High Resolution Artwork and can CHOOSE between the Lily Clairet or Eleta Foxton Fridge Magnets.

Receive a stylish, physical copy of the game in addition to a digital copy, as well as the option of having your name being thanked in the rolling credits! You will also receive a copy of the Printed Paperback Manga/Novella 'Eleta Foxton and the Rochester Diamond', the Cute Illustrated Postcard, the Original Soundtrack, the High Resolution Artwork and BOTH the Lily Clairet and Eleta Foxton Fridge Magnets.

Receive the physical copy of the game in addition to a digital copy, the Cute Notebook, the option of having your name being thanked in the rolling credits,  the Printed Paperback Manga/Novella 'Eleta Foxton and the Rochester Diamond', the Cute Illustrated Postcard, the Original Soundtrack, the High Resolution Artwork and BOTH the Lily Clairet and Eleta Foxton Fridge Magnets.

Les Mis\u00e9rables. Receive an absolutely stunning collector's 26x36 inch satin cotton wooden frame printed canvas, crafted by a local professional here in England \u2013 perfect to grace any home. Splashed on the foreground is a Lily Clairet rendition of the Les Mis\u00e9rables musical poster drawn in manga style. You will also receive a Cute Notebook, a physical copy of the Game in addition to a digital copy, a copy of the Printed Paperback Manga/Novella 'Eleta Foxton and the Rochester Diamond', the option of having your name being thanked in the rolling credits, the Cute Illustrated Postcard, the Original Soundtrack, the High Resolution Artwork and both the Lily Clairet and Eleta Foxton Fridge Magnets.
